title: World War II Japanese officer sake bottle
content:
accession_no_csv: 2014-00311

  Image: 

  object_work_type: wine bottles

  title_text: World War II Japanese officer sake bottle

  preference: main

  title_language:

  shape: irregular

  materials_name: Not indicated

  techniques_name: Not indicated

  object_colour: multicoloured

  physical_appearance: The image displays a bottle. It has an opener that is maroon in colour. The body of the bottle is light blue in colour and the motif of a gold-coloured crane can be seen. Below the crane on the front and sides of the bottle
 there are several lines of Kanji displayed in yellow. At front of the bottle in the middle
 a five pointed star and a stake with two crossed rifles are featured. There are designs of flowers and leaves around the body of the bottle.

  subject_terms_1: world wars soldiers wine birds (motifs)

 1939 - 1945 Japan. Rikugun Wine bottles

  subject_terms_3: Wars

 1939 - 1945

  context_3: 1939 - 1945

  context_4: 1939

  context_5: 1945

  context_6: Southeast Asia

  sgcool_label_text: This sake bottle belonged to a Japanese officer from the Imperial Army
 which contains the Kikusui flag and crane in the design.

metadata.title_text: World War II Japanese officer sake bottle
metadata.physical_appearance: The image displays a bottle. It has an opener that is maroon in colour. The body of the bottle is light blue in colour and the motif of a gold-coloured crane can be seen. Below the crane on the front and sides of the bottle, there are several lines of Kanji displayed in yellow. At front of the bottle in the middle, a five pointed star and a stake with two crossed rifles are featured. There are designs of flowers and leaves around the body of the bottle.
metadata.subject_terms_2: Rice wines Motifs World War, 1939 - 1945 Japan. Rikugun Wine bottles
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This sake bottle belonged to a Japanese officer from the Imperial Army, which contains the Kikusui flag and crane in the design.
